meanings.definition: A monetary unit of the Philippines, equal to one hundredth of a peso.
meanings.sent1: I found a sentimo on the street.
meanings.sent2: She saved every sentimo to buy a new toy.
meanings.sent3: The sentimo rolled away, playing hard to get.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was as valuable as a sentimo.
meanings.sent5: The shiny sentimo sparkled in the sunlight.
